mcq.statement: Which major announcement was made during the coronation ceremony held in Delhi in 1911?

options.b: Shifting of capital from Calcutta to Delhi

mcq.one_liner: During the 1911 coronation ceremony in Delhi, the British king announced the **shifting of the capital from Calcutta to Delhi and the annulment of the Partition of Bengal**.

suggestions.topic: Calcutta to Delhi Shift / Annulment of Partition (1911)
